content: Mary pensava che Tom non fosse alla festa di Halloween, però in realtà lui la stava osservando da dietro la sua maschera da lupo mannaro.
translations: eng:Mary thought that Tom wasn't at the Halloween party, but in fact he was secretly observing her from behind his werewolf
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
